name: Comfy Inca Pants-Purple
description:
Comfortable lounge pants, fitted on the bottom, yet loose on the thighs and calves. Like Many of our "comfy" items there is no elastic on the waist band just a wide band created from the same fabric:

* 95% Cotton 5% Lycra 
* Inca Accents 100% Acrylic 
* Size XS, S, M 
* Available in Black w/ pink Inca Manta, Grey w/ lemon Inca Manta and Beige w/ blood Orange Inca Manta 
* Made in the U.S.A 
* Can be worn tight or baggy depends on preference 
* Why are they comfy? No elastic in the waist band; the elastic in the fabric keeps them up! 
* Also in Grey, Black, and Purple

name: Trackies (Camel)
description: These incredibly soft and comfortable trackies are made of 100% recycled bottles. Each is embroidered with our signature "SalaamShalom" design on the back right leg, as well as being individually numbered on the bottom left leg. Each trackie has an Inca drawstring that can be visible or easily tucked away. 100% recycled bottle fabric with cotton drawstring. More sizing info here.

name: Trackies (Navy)
description: These incredibly soft and comfortable trackies are made of recycled bottles. Through a special process, the ultra-cozy fabric is created with half the carbon footprint than that of non-recycled fabrics. Each is embroidered with our signature "SalaamShalom" design on the back right leg in neon orange as well as being individually numbered on the bottom left leg- signifying the unique number that YOU are in spreading the message of PEACE. Each trackie has a fun coloured Inca drawstring that can be visible or easily tucked away. More sizing info here.
